pages.title: Home
pages.summary: ENCS maps global banking fault lines, simulates cascading failures across 4,500+ institutions, predicts contagion with GNNs, and stress-tests climate shocks.
highlights: Systemic Risk Intelligence platform for contagion analysis
4,500+ banks modeled, ~24T interbank volume
PNA GNN with 13-dimensional feature space
Rust-based intraday simulation for speed

pages.title: Methodology
pages.summary: Explains four computational layers: clearing physics, graph intelligence, strategic game theory, and climate contagion.
highlights: Eisenberg–Noe clearing fixed-point with Picard iteration
Status categories: Safe, Distressed, Default based on equity loss
Intraday extension adds fire-sale price impact, panic withdrawals, margin spirals
PNA GNN predicts risk frequency (continuous 0–1) from 13 features

pages.title: Architecture
pages.summary: Pipeline covers data ingestion, topology reconstruction, simulation engine, and GNN training; includes CCP transformation and derivatives risk weighting.
highlights: Tiered core–periphery gravity model + RAS/Sinkhorn balancing
Rust FFI for high-throughput simulation
Fire-sale exponential price impact and intraday dynamics
Balanced Monte Carlo regimes and risk-frequency regression target

pages.title: Simulation
pages.summary: Interactive simulation for mechanical, climate, and strategic scenarios with timelines and detailed analysis.
highlights: Mechanical: shock severity, intraday steps, panic rate, fire-sale alpha, margin sensitivity
Climate: carbon tax and green subsidy with systemic propagation
Strategic: opaque vs transparent global-games regime and run-rate comparison
Detailed analysis includes timelines for defaults, distressed, gridlock, margin calls, and equity loss

pages.title: Bank Explorer
pages.summary: Sortable bank table with balance-sheet metrics, climate exposure, and GNN risk frequency per institution.
highlights: Risk frequency from PNA GNN regression model
Carbon score and brown/green asset exposure
Leverage and equity for quick fragility signals

pages.title: Glossary
pages.summary: Definitions for key concepts like fire-sale spirals, contagion channels, GNNs, and Green Swan events.
highlights: Eisenberg–Noe clearing, fire-sale spirals, margin calls
Contagion channels and systemic risk metrics
GNN risk frequency and core–periphery structure
Green Swan climate transition shocks
